email.text:
Congratulations on securing your tickets to **IC Hack 19 Powered by Cisco**! IC Hack is back bigger than ever for its eighth consecutive year, with IC Hack 19 taking place on **26-27th January** at the Imperial College London South Kensington campus with over 400 participants!
If it's your first time at IC Hack, be sure to check out our [IC Hack 18 Montage](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hngr7ts45Dc) video!
This email contains **important attendee information**, so please take your time to go through its contents.

## CV Upload
With over fifteen sponsors, IC Hack 19 is a great opportunity for you to meet recruiters and engineers from our sponsoring companies in person.
Our sponsors are looking to recruit from the event for various roles. To help participants **get the most out of IC Hack 19**, interact with our sponsors to the fullest and to help you build your network, we are asking everyone to supply their CV.
Make sure to submit yours using [this form](https://goo.gl/forms/tqqDFvMjuYPdqhdC2) before **Friday 18th January 11:59pm**!

## Ticket Cancellations
As we have a very long waitlist, if you are unable to attend, please cancel your ticket [via Eventbrite](https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/mytickets/) as soon as possible so your space can be released. If you are having difficulties doing so, you can email us at info@ichack.org. Please note that tickets are non-transferable.

## What to Bring
On the day, be sure to have your Eventbrite ticket ready (either digital or printed - up to you!) and a **valid form of Government ID** (driving license or passport). Please note you must be **over 18** on the day of the event to attend.

## Equipment Requests
We're happy to provide our attendees with hardware/equipment for their hacks on a best-effort basis. If you have an idea which requires additional equipment, please send a short proposal to info@ichack.org detailing your idea and what equipment you require, and we'll do our best to provide you with what you need!

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to let us know by emailing info@ichack.org.
We look forward to seeing you at IC Hack 19!
_- The IC Hack 19 team_
